Hero.headline: A Spoonful of <highlight>Happiness</highlight>
Hero.description: Authentic Italian gelato, handmade daily in small batches using traditional techniques and organic ingredients.

Featured.headline: The Classics
Featured.description: These flavors are a must-try. Handmade daily using traditional family recipes and the finest ingredients.

stracciatella.name: Stracciatella
stracciatella.desc: Cream gelato with crunchy chocolate chips

Story.headline: Tradition You Can Taste
Story.p1: It all started in 2010 in a small village in Sicily. Nonna Maria taught us that good gelato needs only three things: fresh milk, the best fruit, and lots of patience.
Story.p2: Today we continue this tradition in Germany. We use no ready-made mixes‚Äîevery flavor is prepared fresh every morning in our lab behind the shop.

Testimonials.headline: What our guests say
Testimonials.description: We love seeing you happy. Here are a few words from our community.

r1.text: Super nice staff, multilingual and very helpful! The prices are also not bank breaking as a bonus
r1.author: Emma Kerkhey

r2.text: Really lovely ice cream shop, relaxed atmosphere, super delicious ice cream, and incredibly friendly service. I'll definitely be back.
r2.author: Ayscha Nasra

r3.text: Super delicious ice cream and incredibly friendly staff. Happy to come back anytime üíó
r3.author: Veronikaa

Menu.title: Our Ice Cream Menu
Menu.description: Handcrafted gelato, fresh fruits, and the finest ingredients. All fruit flavors are 100% vegan.

spaghetti.name: Spaghetti Ice Cream
spaghetti.desc: Vanilla ice cream, strawberry sauce, white chocolate

tartufo.name: Tartufo Nero
tartufo.desc: Chocolate & hazelnut ice cream with cocoa coating

Gallery.title: Our Gallery
Gallery.description: A glimpse into our world: From preparation to perfect enjoyment.

Hours.title: Our Locations
Hours.description: Whether in Marburg city center or C√∂lbe ‚Äì we look forward to your visit.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Do you have questions, suggestions, or want to book us for an event? Write to us.

form.success_desc: We have received your message and will get back to you soon.

faq.q1: Do you offer vegan ice cream?
faq.a1: Yes! All our fruit flavors are 100% vegan and lactose-free.
faq.a2: Yes, we accept all major cards and contactless payments.

Careers.title: Careers at iTrulli
Careers.description: We are looking for passionate people to serve smiles and ice cream. Join our family!

2.title: Flexibility
2.desc: Working hours that fit your studies/life.

3.title: Best Team
3.desc: Family atmosphere and of course: Free ice cream!

service.title: Service Staff (m/f/d)
service.desc: You love dealing with people, enjoy serving tables, and keep a cool head even on hot summer days.

counter.title: Ice Cream Server (m/f/d)
counter.desc: You are the face behind the counter. You scoop the perfect balls and advise our guests on flavor choices.

production.title: Gelato Maker (m/f/d)
production.desc: Do you have experience in ice cream making or want to learn the craft from scratch? Help us make the best ice cream in town.
